command: python3 -c 'import os,sys,filecmp; assert os.geteuid()==0; cur="/mnt/flash/EOS-4.29.1F.swi"; ref="/mnt/usb/golden/EOS-4.29.1F.swi"; ok=filecmp.cmp(cur,ref,shallow=False); print("match" if ok else "mismatch"); sys.exit(0 if ok else 4)'
explanation: Performs a deep binary comparison of the active EOS image against a golden reference copy.
rationale_steps: Use root to read images on local and removable storage.
Binary-compare current image and golden image.
Report mismatch to indicate potential tampering.
